label: Law and Public Policy
description: Examines the nature of law, law makers, and law appliers; the determinants of law-making; and the societal impact of law. Prerequisite: PS 101, six hours of Political Science credit, or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: PS 101, six hours of Political Science credit, or consent of instructor.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Not intended for students with Freshman class standing.
